data.name: Berserk Reborn
data.detailed_description:
In Berserk Reborn, players become warlords who must explore and conquer the world of Udhin. It is divided into islands and inhabited by all kinds of fierce warriors and mythical creatures.

There are 6 elements that rule the world and the cards in Berserk Reborn: Earth, Light, Water, Fire, Darkness, and Mercenaries.

Berserk Reborn cards are beautifully illustrated and belong to one of the six elements. They have different levels and types of rarity, crystal cost, abilities, defense and attack. They can represent heroes, creatures, terrain, and equipment, and most of them can be evolved or upgraded using element experience.
By completing daily quests, special quests, and participating in battles, players earn rewards such as cards, gold, and silver.

To participate in battles you need mana that can be obtained with game time. It is also used to travel between islands through portals.
In the in-game store, players can purchase card packs, cosmetic items, experience, mana boosts, etc.

Features:

    - Global Strategy Elements: Conquer other players' lands, build an island with the conquests, and protect your allies from enemies.
    - Different types of PvP and PvE battles: campaigns, conquest of other players' lands, tournaments, ranked ladder, clan wars...
    - Unique trading cards illustrated by world artists.
    - Squads: A squad consists of eight cards of the same element or mercenaries. A squad must be headed by a hero card that defines the element of the squad. The special parameters of a hero card determine how many creature, equipment, and terrain cards are needed to create a squad.
    - Each Berserk Reborn player has their own island. There is a magical tower in the center of this island that is surrounded by five-element lands that will provide element experience.

data.short_description: Berserk Reborn is a collectible card MMO where you will fight to rule the world of Udhin. Form squads, get legendary cards and defeat your enemies to become a legend of the world of Udhin.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Turkish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 o Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D o AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 (256 MB) o ATI Radeon X1600 Pro (256 MB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 o Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600, AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ o superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB), ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB) o superior
